data.prayer: Please, convict the 73 believers in Adrar, Mauritania to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Adrar, Mauritania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Adrar, Mauritania a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.section_summary: On average, 20 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Adrar, Mauritania.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Adrar with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 73 believers in the state of Adrar into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Nemadi people. Make the Nemadi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, cause the 73 believers in Adrar to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 59,700 citizens of the the state of Adrar.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 59,700 people living in Adrar through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.
